short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Uses the chrome.commands API by creating a new keyboard macro for switching tabs in the browser window.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tab Flipper is a browser extension that enhances the tab management functionality of your web browser. It allows you to quickly switch between open tabs using keyboard shortcuts or mouse gestures, which can save time and improve your workflow.
